text: Naludɨ 5.14 Mk 6.13, 16.18 hulaŋ mu agaŋ hɨmuhɨmu daŋ hɨniavɨla uami. Ha hulaŋ iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavalɨ agɨladɨ hali hɨsɨŋ agɨlasaŋ ciaŋ abɨci uci nudɨ pɨŋ vehavɨm uami. Vevɨla aludɨ Hekɨlɨ dɨ ibi hɨvɨ kɨlɨ olivɨ agɨladɨ amɨŋ agɨladɨ mɨtɨ agadɨ nudɨ hadipɨlɨ sabɨ hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨjiavɨm uami. Lavɨla Asɨ nudɨ huaci lamalama saŋ Asɨ dɨ abavɨm uami.
